table.name: vte_control_layout_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_control_layout_fields` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `module` varchar(50) NULL , `description` varchar(255) NULL , `field` varchar(255) NULL , `condition` text NULL , `layout` varchar(255) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

table.name: vte_control_layout_fields_task
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_control_layout_fields_task` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `clf_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `active` smallint(1) DEFAULT 0, `actions` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL , `valid` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`module`));
